mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.report_id AS "reportId", a.product_id AS "productId", a.individualcode AS "individualcode", a.integral AS "integral", a.note AS "note", a.is_record_unit AS "isRecordUnit", a.is_verify_individualcode AS "isVerifyIndividualcode", a.scan_code AS "scanCode", a.produce_date AS "produceDate", a.outdate AS "outdate"
LEFT JOIN t_report_d_standbook b ON b.id = a.report_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_report_d_standbook_product_detail( id, report_id, product_id, individualcode, integral, note, is_record_unit, is_verify_individualcode, scan_code, produce_date, outdate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{reportId}, #{productId}, #{individualcode}, #{integral}, #{note}, #{isRecordUnit}, #{isVerifyIndividualcode}, #{scanCode}, #{produceDate}, #{outdate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_report_d_standbook_product_detail SET report_id = #{reportId}, product_id = #{productId}, individualcode = #{individualcode}, integral = #{integral}, note = #{note}, is_record_unit = #{isRecordUnit}, is_verify_individualcode = #{isVerifyIndividualcode}, scan_code = #{scanCode}, produce_date = #{produceDate}, outdate = #{outdate} WHERE id = #{id}
